issue.title: [Go] More readable example for csv.Reader
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-3964](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-3964). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Example of godoc doesn't include input file(testdata/simple.csv). So it's hard to understand the output.

<https://godoc.org/github.com/apache/arrow/go/arrow/csv>

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-3964?focusedCommentId=16714203) by Kouhei Sutou (kou):*
Issue resolved by pull request 3131
